Posts.Content: Feb 13, 2011 01:14PM somewhereinbetween wrote: I just want to thank everyone for the encouragement being sent via the internet.Since being diagnosed with breast cancer my life has changed in very small and subtle ways. For instance my thinking is beginning to follow a certain pattern. It seems that I am more intuned to what's going on around me and i am more apt to live in that moment. Even when I want to cry, I just just laugh and savor the moment enjoying others experience as my own. I understand that all women do not have to die from their misfortune and can live full lives, but the reality of living with any cancer is that eventually it becomes terminal, whether this true or not. I must face the reality of my fate. Although I am encouraged, I am afraid of living. So while I savor the breaths I take, I know that each day counts towards the rest of my life.
